SELECT i.id, i.is_open, i.title, m3.nick_name AS editor, latest_editor.modified_at, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT l.id ORDER BY l.id SEPARATOR ',') AS label_ids, m.id AS writerId, m.nick_name AS writer, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m2.id ORDER BY a.id SEPARATOR ',') AS assignee_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m2.nick_name ORDER BY a.id SEPARATOR ',') AS assignee_names, ms.id AS milestone_id, ms.title AS milestone_title
FROM issue as i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT issue_id , MAX(id) as id FROM history GROUP BY issue_id ) AS latest_history ON i.id = latest_history.issue_id LEFT JOIN history latest_editor ON latest_editor.id=latest_history.id LEFT JOIN issue_label il ON i.id = il.issue_id LEFT JOIN label l ON il.label_id = l.id LEFT JOIN assignee a ON i.id = a.issue_id LEFT JOIN member m ON i.writer_id = m.id LEFT JOIN member m2 ON a.member_id = m2.id LEFT JOIN member m3 ON latest_editor.editor = m3.id LEFT JOIN milestone ms ON i.milestone_id = ms.id
LEFT JOIN comments cmts ON i.id = cmts.issue_id
WHERE
i.is_open = 0
i.is_open = 1
AND i.writer_id = #{writer}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM assignee a2 WHERE a2.issue_id = i.id AND a2.member_id = #{assignee} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM issue_label il2 WHERE il2.issue_id = i.id AND il2.label_id = #{label} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM milestone ms2 WHERE ms2.id = i.milestone_Id AND ms2.id = #{milestone} )
AND cmts.writer_id = #{commentWriter}
GROUP BY i.id, i.is_open, i.title, latest_editor.editor, latest_editor.issue_id, m.nick_name, ms.title;
